text: The FBI Ten Most Wanted Fugitives is a most wanted list used by the United States’s Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI). The list was created to help law enforcement catch dangerous criminals. The first person added to the list was Thomas J. Holden who was a robber. He was also apart of the Holden–Keating Gang. He was added to the list on March 14, 1950, the day the list was published. == References == Category:Federal Bureau of Investigation
title: FBI Ten Most Wanted Fugitives
